Introduction to Graphic Design.label: Understanding the principles and elements of graphic design, including color theory, typography, layout, and composition.

Adobe Photoshop Basics.label: Mastering essential tools and techniques in Adobe Photoshop for image editing, manipulation, and graphic creation.

Adobe Illustrator Essentials.label: Learning the fundamentals of Adobe Illustrator for vector graphics creation, logo design, and illustration.

Typography Mastery.label: Exploring typography principles, font selection, and typographic hierarchy for effective design communication.

Layout Design.label: Developing skills in layout design for print and digital media, including magazine spreads, posters, and web layouts.

Logo Design.label: Understanding the process of logo design, from conceptualization to execution, and creating impactful logos for brands.

Branding and Identity Design.label: Exploring brand identity systems, including logo usage, color palettes, and brand guidelines.

UI/UX Design Principles.label: Introduction to user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design principles for web and app design.

Portfolio Development.label: Building a professional design portfolio showcasing your skills and projects to potential clients or employers.
